match.xpath: /Defs/ThingDef[@ParentName = "LTS_MedievalDoor" or @ParentName = "LTS_FuturisticDoor" or @ParentName = "LTS_SimpleDoor" or @ParentName = "LTS_SingleDoor" or @ParentName = "LTS_FancyDoor" or (@ParentName = "LTS_DoorBase" and not(@Abstract="True"))]/inspectorTabs

nomatch.xpath: /Defs/ThingDef[@ParentName = "LTS_MedievalDoor" or @ParentName = "LTS_FuturisticDoor" or @ParentName = "LTS_SimpleDoor" or @ParentName = "LTS_SingleDoor" or @ParentName = "LTS_FancyDoor" or (@ParentName = "LTS_DoorBase" and not(@Abstract="True"))]

match.xpath: /Defs/ThingDef[@ParentName = "LTS_MedievalDoor" or @ParentName = "LTS_FuturisticDoor" or @ParentName = "LTS_SimpleDoor" or @ParentName = "LTS_SingleDoor" or @ParentName = "LTS_FancyDoor" or (@ParentName = "LTS_DoorBase" and not(@Abstract="True"))]/inspectorTabs
